changelog: IMPROVED: Internal code restructuring for better stability
IMPROVED: Contact sheet generation reliability improvements

versions.release_notes: Remote debug logging for easier support
changelog: NEW: Remote debug logging - logs can be sent to support automatically
NEW: Send Logs button on About tab for easy troubleshooting
NEW: Auto-send option for automatic log uploads
IMPROVED: Better logging throughout sync process for diagnostics

versions.release_notes: Bug fixes for PayPlan calculator and invoice sync
changelog: FIX: PayPlan Calculator button now opens correctly
FIX: Payment Type selection now applies correctly
FIX: Invoice sync no longer crashes on startup
FIX: Client ID validation now works correctly
IMPROVED: Better display scaling on high-DPI monitors
FIX: Dialog buttons no longer overlap text

versions.release_notes: Contact sheet generation and invoice improvements
changelog: NEW: Contact sheet JPG automatically generated from orders
NEW: Contact sheets auto-uploaded to GHL Media
IMPROVED: Invoice sync now supports payment schedules
